name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AirThumb: Thumbs up or down for Airbnb

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rate Airbnb listings with thumbs up or down. Save notes for each listing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays a thumbs up and thumbs down icon on each Airbnb listing. Click on these to remember whether you liked the listing or not.

The extension also displays a text input field on each listing which allows you to add notes to the listing.

Disclaimer: Whether you clicked thumbs up or down, or any notes that you added are stored on your computer locally only. The data won't be remembered if you change computers or reinstall the extension.
